rooms.name: Flower Room
rooms.description: A serene chamber adorned with vibrant flowers, casting a gentle fragrance in the air.

rooms.name: Ruins Entrance
rooms.description: You find yourself at the entrance of the ancient Ruins, its eerie atmosphere lingering around you.

rooms.name: Ruins Hallway
rooms.description: A dimly lit hallway stretches before you, lined with cracked stone walls and whispering echoes.

rooms.name: Ruins Save1
rooms.description: A small room with a peculiar aura, emanating a sense of safety and respite from the harsh world outside.

rooms.name: Ruins Save1 Candy
rooms.description: A whimsical room filled with colorful candies and treats, tempting you with their sugary allure.

rooms.name: Ruins Puzzleroom1
rooms.description: You step into a perplexing chamber, its walls adorned with intricate puzzles and enigmatic symbols.

rooms.name: Ghost Room
rooms.description: As you enter the ghostly chamber, an ethereal mist swirls around you, accompanied by faint whispers from the other side.

rooms.name: Ghost Room Candy
rooms.description: Within the ghostly room, shelves overflow with enchanting candies and confections, reminiscent of a spectral delight.

rooms.name: Ruins Puzzle Room2
rooms.description: Step into an intricate puzzle room, its enigmatic mechanisms inviting you to unravel their secrets once more.

rooms.name: Ruins Crosspath
rooms.description: Find yourself at a crossroads within the ruins, where different paths intertwine, promising divergent journeys.

rooms.name: Knife room
rooms.description: Enter a room adorned with gleaming blades and shimmering weapons, a testament to the ancient battles fought within these walls.

rooms.name: House Entrance Save
rooms.description: You stand at the entrance of a humble abode, where a warm and inviting atmosphere envelops you, providing solace and safety.

rooms.name: Toriel's House
rooms.description: As you step into Toriel's cozy home, a warm ambiance welcomes you, emanating from the crackling fireplace and butterscotch pie.

rooms.name: Bedrooms
rooms.description: Within the bedrooms, a tranquil aura envelops the air, beckoning weary adventurers to rest their heads and find solace in their dreams.

rooms.name: Toriel's Room
rooms.description: Within Toriel's home, a sense of maternal warmth permeates the air, offering a haven of comfort and love.

rooms.name: Your Room
rooms.description: As you enter your own private retreat, the room reflects your own personality and desires, providing a sense of familiarity and belonging.

rooms.name: Chair Room
rooms.description: Step into the Chair Room, where an assortment of comfortable chairs invites you to take a moment and relax amidst their welcoming embrace.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Embark into the Kitchen, filled with tantalizing aromas and culinary delights, where delectable creations come to life and nourish the soul.

rooms.name: House Downstairs
rooms.description: Venture into the depths of the house as you find yourself in the downstairs area, where mysterious secrets lurk within its dimly lit corridors.

rooms.name: Downstairs Hallway
rooms.description: Traverse the eerie downstairs hallway, its atmosphere heavy with a sense of foreboding, as if it holds the key to unfolding mysteries.

rooms.name: Toriel Encounter
rooms.description: Find yourself face-to-face with Toriel, a kind-hearted caretaker, whose warm eyes hold both wisdom and concern for your safety.

rooms.name: Ruins Exit
rooms.description: Stand at the threshold of the Ruins, the gateway to the unknown, where ancient remnants and unseen dangers await those who dare to venture forth.

rooms.name: Tundra Hallway
rooms.description: Step into the chilling Tundra hallway, where the frigid air bites at your skin and the silence is broken only by the faint echoes of distant howls.

rooms.name: Sans Dialogue
rooms.description: Engage in a conversation with Sans, a laid-back and enigmatic skeleton, as he imparts his cryptic wisdom and witty remarks.

rooms.name: Lamp Room
rooms.description: Discover a dimly lit room adorned with flickering lamps, casting mysterious shadows on the walls, as if concealing secrets waiting to be unveiled.

rooms.name: Tundra Save1
rooms.description: Navigate through the icy Tundra, where a bitter cold permeates the air, and make a pivotal decision that may shape the course of your journey.

rooms.name: Fishing Room
rooms.description: Enter a serene room where the sound of trickling water and the anticipation of a successful catch fill the air, beckoning you to try your hand at fishing.

rooms.name: Doggo Encounter
rooms.description: Encounter Doggo, a mischievous yet friendly canine, whose playful nature hides a deeper loyalty and a secret that may lead to unexpected discoveries.

rooms.name: Snowman Room
rooms.description: Enter a room where a jovial snowman stands, his infectious laughter and heartwarming tales providing a brief respite from the cold and challenges ahead.

rooms.name: Tundra Puzzle
rooms.description: Embark on a challenging puzzle in the icy Tundra, where logic and wit are your only companions, and success leads to the next step of your journey.

rooms.name: Tundra Spaghetti Save2
rooms.description: Continue your exploration through the frigid Tundra, encountering new challenges and indulging in a warm plate of spaghetti to restore your determination.

rooms.name: Ice Cream Room
rooms.description: Enter a delightful room filled with frozen treats, where the sweet taste of ice cream melts away your worries and prepares you for the challenges that lie ahead.

rooms.name: Danger Bridge
rooms.description: Cross a perilous bridge suspended over a treacherous chasm, as the howling wind and cracking ice serve as reminders of the dangers that lurk in the unforgiving Tundra.

rooms.name: Snowdin Town
rooms.description: Arrive in the quaint Snowdin Town, a peaceful haven amidst the icy landscape, where friendly monsters reside and await your arrival with warm hospitality.

rooms.name: Grillbys
rooms.description: Step into Grillby's, a cozy diner where mouthwatering aromas invite you to take a break and engage in lively conversations with the local monsters.

rooms.name: Papyrus House
rooms.description: Step inside Papyrus' House, a peculiar abode filled with eccentric decorations and the constant sound of bone-chilling puns.

rooms.name: Snowdin Town2
rooms.description: Explore more of the charming Snowdin Town, where cozy shops and friendly monsters await your visit.

rooms.name: Snowed Inn
rooms.description: Rest and recuperate in the warm embrace of the Snowed Inn, a charming inn that offers a cozy haven from the cold.

rooms.name: Snowdin Town3
rooms.description: Continue your exploration of Snowdin Town, discovering new corners and meeting intriguing characters along the way.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Enter the vast Library, where shelves upon shelves of books beckon you to immerse yourself in knowledge and stories of the Underground.

rooms.name: Waterfall Entrance
rooms.description: Reach the grand entrance to the enchanting Waterfall, where the sound of cascading water and mystical echoes fill the air.

rooms.name: Waterfall Save1
rooms.description: Find yourself in a tranquil space within the Waterfall, offering respite and a chance to save your progress.

rooms.name: Waterfall Puzzle1
rooms.description: Engage your wits in a challenging puzzle room that tests your problem-solving skills.

rooms.name: Quiche Room
rooms.description: Discover a room dedicated to quiches, where tantalizing aromas fill the air and delicious treats await your indulgence.

rooms.name: Telescope Room
rooms.description: Peer through a powerful telescope and witness the wonders of the cosmos, as well as the breathtaking beauty of the Waterfall.

rooms.name: Ice Cream Room2
rooms.description: Savor the sweet delights of the Waterfall's renowned ice cream, a delectable treat that will tickle your taste buds.

rooms.name: Waterfall Save2
rooms.description: Take another opportunity to save your progress in the midst of the Waterfall's captivating ambience.

rooms.name: Undyne Maze
rooms.description: Embark on a treacherous journey through the perilous Undyne Maze, where danger lurks around every corner.

rooms.name: Undyne Encounter
rooms.description: Prepare to face the formidable Undyne in a thrilling encounter that will test your mettle and determination.

rooms.name: Core Entrance
rooms.description: Enter the majestic Core, the heart of the Underground, as you embark on the final leg of your journey.

rooms.name: Core Lobby
rooms.description: Find yourself in the grandiose Core Lobby, a sprawling area that leads to various chambers and challenges.

rooms.name: Core Puzzle Room1
rooms.description: Engage in a challenging puzzle that tests your intelligence and problem-solving abilities.

rooms.name: Core Puzzle Room2
rooms.description: Navigate through a complex labyrinth of puzzles and obstacles, pushing your skills to the limit.

rooms.name: Core Lobby Main
rooms.description: Step into the main area of the Core Lobby, the central hub of the core facilities.

rooms.name: Core Bridge
rooms.description: Cross the expansive Core Bridge, a suspended pathway that leads deeper into the core.

rooms.name: Core Bridge1
rooms.description: Explore the upper section of Core Bridge, where secrets and challenges await.

rooms.name: Core Bridge Item Room1
rooms.description: Discover a hidden room on Core Bridge, filled with valuable items and treasures.

rooms.name: Core Bridge Item Room2
rooms.description: Uncover another secret room on Core Bridge, containing rare artifacts and useful equipment.

rooms.name: Core Bridge2
rooms.description: Continue your journey across the lower section of Core Bridge, venturing deeper into the core's mysteries.

rooms.name: Core Maze
rooms.description: Navigate through the intricate Core Maze, a labyrinthine network of passages and corridors.

rooms.name: Core Bridge Main
rooms.description: Arrive at the central area of Core Bridge, connecting various sections of the core's infrastructure.

rooms.name: Core Center Puzzle
rooms.description: Engage in a challenging puzzle within the Core Center, testing your wits and problem-solving skills.

rooms.name: Core Item Room
rooms.description: Discover a hidden room in the core, filled with valuable items and equipment to aid your journey.

rooms.name: Core Center Main
rooms.description: Enter the heart of the core's operations, the bustling and central area of the Core Center.

rooms.name: Core Hallway
rooms.description: Proceed through the expansive Core Hallway, a passageway leading to various significant areas.

rooms.name: Asgore's Castle
rooms.description: Enter Asgore's majestic castle, a grand structure that houses the ruler of the underground.

rooms.name: Tea Room
rooms.description: Relax in the Tea Room, a tranquil space where you can enjoy a soothing cup of tea and gather your thoughts.

rooms.name: Throne
rooms.description: Approach the grand throne room, where Asgore presides over his kingdom.

rooms.name: Secret Room
rooms.description: Discover a hidden chamber tucked away within the depths of Asgore's Castle.

rooms.name: Castle Hall
rooms.description: Enter the grand Castle Hall, a regal space connecting different areas of Asgore's Castle.

rooms.name: Asgore Encounter
rooms.description: Prepare for a fateful encounter with Asgore, the formidable ruler of the underground.

rooms.name: Flowey Encounter
rooms.description: Confront Flowey, the mischievous and enigmatic creature who guards the path ahead.

rooms.name: Barrier Break
rooms.description: Witness the climactic moment as the barrier stands ready to be shattered.

rooms.name: Core Elevator
rooms.description: Ride the Core Elevator, a vertical conduit leading to the depths of the underground.

rooms.name: Underground Exit
rooms.description: Reach the exit of the underground, where a new world awaits beyond.
